scripts.build:chrome-ci: npx cross-env TARGET=chrome BUILD_DIR=build-ci/chrome-mv3 vite build
scripts.build:firefox-ci: npx cross-env TARGET=firefox BUILD_DIR=build-ci/firefox-mv2 vite build
scripts.build:all-ci: npm run build:chrome-ci && npm run build:firefox-ci
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e-ui: npm run build && npx playwright test --ui
